name: Proactive Scheduling
description: AI-powered crew assignment proposals with 1-click accept/tweak functionality for superintendents

relatedFeatures.description: Uses confirm-to-execute pattern for all AI-generated schedules. No schedule is activated without explicit superintendent approval.
Consumes task definitions from the Course Area Task Management library to understand what work needs to be scheduled
Works in parallel - FEAT-002 handles AI proposals, FEAT-014 provides the optimization engine logic
Once schedules are confirmed, they are pushed to Worker Schedule Management for worker visibility

consumes.description: Task library with requirements, estimated duration, skill requirements, and course area assignments
Current worker schedules, skills, certifications, and availability constraints
5-day weather forecast for intelligent scheduling adjustments

produces.description: AI-generated crew assignments with optimization rationale, awaiting superintendent confirmation
Efficiency scores, travel time savings, skill utilization metrics

prd.problemStatement: Superintendents spend 2-3 hours each morning manually creating crew assignments, often resulting in suboptimal schedules due to complexity of considering weather, worker skills, travel time, and course priorities simultaneously.
goals: Reduce schedule creation time from 2-3 hours to under 10 minutes
Minimize travel time between tasks by 30%
Ensure proper skill matching for all assigned tasks

inScope: AI-powered analysis of tasks, workers, and constraints
Generation of optimized crew assignment proposals
outOfScope: Automated execution without confirmation (handled by FEAT-005)

userStories: As a superintendent, I want AI to propose optimized crew assignments so I can spend more time on the course instead of in the office
As a superintendent, I want to see why the AI made specific assignments so I can trust and understand the recommendations
As a superintendent, I want to quickly tweak AI proposals when I know something the system doesn't so I maintain control
